Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets have lost their last 17 out of 18 games
The Cavaliers are currently on the path to having 72 wins, which is a mark that very few teams have reached in NBA history
Both LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller are listed as 'questionable' for this contest
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets lost both matchups to Cleveland earlier in the season, which resulted in double-digit losses
Evan Mobley has had a huge impact in the matchups versus the Hornets. Mobley also surpassed a career-high 41 points in the recent game between these two teams
Others: The Hornets' two-star players, LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller, have missed the past couple of games
The Cavaliers have easily been the biggest shock of the NBA this season with their new head coach, Kenny Atkinson
